alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay, northeastern Nuckolls, Fillmore and Thayer Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1111 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harvard to near Edgar to Nelson. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Edgar around 1115 PM CDT. Ong and Nora around 1120 PM CDT. Sutton, Davenport and Oak around 1125 PM CDT. Shickley and Ruskin around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carleton, Deshler, Grafton, Bruning, Strang, Geneva, Hebron and Fairmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
